name: rijksmuseum
description: Interface with the Rijksmuseum API to search artworks, retrieve artwork details, access image tiles, and explore user collections.

examples.title: Artwork Discovery
examples.description: Queries related to discovering artworks in the museum's collection.
examples.prompt: "Show me all paintings by Rembrandt from the 1640s"

examples.title: Artwork Analysis
examples.description: Queries related to analyzing specific artworks.
examples.prompt: "Tell me everything about The Night Watch"

examples.title: Artist Research
examples.description: Queries focused on researching artists and their works.

examples.title: Thematic Exploration
examples.description: Queries that explore themes in the artworks.

examples.title: Collection Analysis
examples.prompt: "Show me the most popular user-curated collections"

examples.title: Visual Details
examples.description: Queries for examining visual details in artworks.
examples.prompt: "Let me examine the details in the background of The Night Watch"
